meaningMnemonic: Only <kanji>accept</kanji> new people moving in <kanji>nearby</kanji> once you've finished properly <vocabulary>monitoring</vocabulary> them! <vocabulary>Tapping</vocabulary> into their phones will probably help too, but don't tell anyone I told you to do that.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
